verses.verse: He showed<WH7200> me Joshua<WH3091> the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548> standing<WH5975> before<WH6440> the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and Satan<WH7854> standing<WH5975> at his right hand<WH3225> to be his adversary.<WH7853>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Satan,<WH7854> "Yahweh<WH3068> rebuke<WH1605> you,<WH7854> Satan! Yes,<WH3068> Yahweh who has chosen<WH977> Jerusalem<WH3389> rebuke<WH1605> you!<WH181> Isn't this a burning stick plucked<WH5337> out of the fire?<WH784>"
Now Joshua<WH3091> was clothed<WH3847> with filthy<WH6674> garments,<WH899> and was standing<WH5975> before<WH6440> the angel.<WH4397>

He answered<WH6030> and spoke<WH559> to those who stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> him,<WH559> saying, "Take the filthy<WH6674> garments<WH899> off<WH5493> of him.<WH559>" To him he said, "Behold,<WH7200> I have caused your iniquity<WH5771> to pass<WH5674> from you,<WH3847> and I will clothe you with rich clothing.<WH4254>"

I said,<WH559> "Let them set<WH7760> a clean<WH2889> turban<WH6797> on his head.<WH7218>" So they set<WH7760> a clean<WH2889> turban<WH6797> on his head,<WH7218> and clothed<WH3847> him;<WH899> and the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> was standing by.<WH5975>
The angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> protested<WH5749> to Joshua,<WH3091> saying,<WH559>

"Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies:<WH6635> <WH3212> 'If you will walk in my ways,<WH1870> and if you will follow<WH8104> my instructions,<WH4931> then you also shall judge<WH1777> my house,<WH1004> and shall also keep<WH8104> my courts,<WH2691> and I will give<WH5414> you a place of access<WH4108> among these who stand by.<WH5975>

Hear<WH8085> now,<WH3091> Joshua the high<WH1419> priest,<WH3548> you and your fellows<WH7453> who sit<WH3427> before<WH6440> you;<WH582> for they are men who are a sign:<WH4159> for,<WH935> behold, I will bring forth my servant,<WH5650> the Branch.<WH6780>

For,<WH68> behold, the stone that I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> Joshua;<WH3091> on one<WH259> stone<WH68> are seven<WH7651> eyes:<WH5869> behold,<WH6605> I will engrave its engraving,<WH6603>' says<WH5002> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> <WH4185> 'and I will remove the iniquity<WH5771> of that land<WH776> in one<WH259> day.<WH3117>
In that day,<WH3117>' says<WH5002> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> <WH7121> 'you will invite every man<WH376> his neighbor<WH7453> under the vine<WH1612> and under the fig tree.<WH8384>'"
